entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump More Americans have died from COVID-19 than in World War I. Whatever happens with monuments to the Traitor States, we sure won't be erecting any statues to the #impeached #loser @realDonaldTrump.
